resources.string: FitQuest Application Terms and Conditions\n\n 1. Acceptance of Terms\n By downloading, installing, or using the FitQuest application, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, please do not use this application.\n\n 2. Service Description\n FitQuest is a fitness tracking application that helps users track sports activities, complete daily missions, and collect points that can be redeemed for rewards.\n\n 3. User Account\n • You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information\n • You are responsible for all activities that occur in your account\n • You must immediately notify us if there is unauthorized use of your account\n\n 4. Application Usage\n • This application is for personal and non-commercial use only\n • You may not use the application for any illegal purposes\n • You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems or networks connected to the application\n\n 5. Points and Rewards System\n • Points are earned by completing missions and activities in the application\n • Points can be exchanged for available vouchers or rewards\n • We reserve the right to change point values or rewards at any time\n • Points cannot be transferred or sold\n\n 6. Privacy and Data\n • We respect your privacy and protect your personal data\n • Location and activity data are collected to improve user experience\n • We will not share your personal data with third parties without your permission\n\n 7. Service Changes\n • We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue services at any time\n • We will notify users of significant changes to services\n\n 8. Limitation of Liability\n • The application is provided "as is" without any warranties\n • We are not responsible for injuries or damages that occur while using the application\n • You use this application at your own risk\n\n 9. User Content\n • You retain rights to content you upload\n • You grant us a license to use that content in the application\n • You are responsible for content you share\n\n 10. Termination\n • We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access if you violate these terms\n • You can stop using the application at any time by deleting your account\n\n 11. Governing Law\n These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Republic of Indonesia.\n\n 12. Contact Us\n If you have questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at support@fitquest.com\n\n Last updated: December 2024
